```{r}

library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)

callnamefunction

coral <- read.csv("global_bleaching_environmental.csv")

leaflet(data = coral) %>% 
  setView(lng = -96.25, lat = 39.50, zoom = 4) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup = ~Temperature_Mean)
```
